title: IDocumentSpecification.Query
description: Gets or sets whether the options passed during a document's open, load, and save can be retrieved by this API.
returns: True to retrieve options, false to not (default)
remarks:
Various options can be passed to document operation APIs such as
IModelDoc2::Save3
,
IModelDocExtension::SaveAs4
, and
ISldWorks::LoadFile4
. These options can be retrieved from the document, if Query is set to true. Only silent information can be retrieved.
